00015         class FeedController extends EmeController
00016         {
00017                 protected $mimetype = 'text/xml; charset=utf-8';
00018                 protected $type = 'rss';
00019 
00020                 protected function init()
00021                 {
00022                         // Call parent's init method
00023                         parent::init();
00024 
00025                         $cached_pages = array('software', 'software_comments', 'diario');
00026                         //$this->before_filter(array('log_visit', 'block_ip'));
00027                         $this->before_filter('block_ip');
00028                         $this->caches_page($cached_pages);
00029                         $this->after_filter('compress', array('only' => $cached_pages));
00030                 }
00031 
00036                 public function software()
00037                 {
00038                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00039 
00040                         $release_factory = new SoftwareRelease();
00041                         if (isset($_GET['id']) && is_numeric($_GET['id']))
00042                         {
00043                                 $this->releases = $release_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => '`released` = 1 ' .
00044                                         'AND `software_id` = \'' . $conn->escape($_GET['id']) . '\' ',
00045                                         'order_by' => '`date` DESC '));
00046                         }
00047                         else
00048                         {
00049                                 $this->releases = $release_factory->find_by_query('SELECT MAX(`software_releases`.`id`) AS `id`, `software_releases`.`software_id`, MAX(`software_releases`.`version`) AS `version`, MAX(`software_releases`.`date`) AS `date` ' .
00050                                         'FROM `softwares` ' .
00051                                         'LEFT JOIN `software_releases` ON `softwares`.`id` = `software_releases`.`software_id` ' .
00052                                         'WHERE `software_releases`.`released` = 1 ' .
00053                                         'GROUP BY `softwares`.`id` ' .
00054                                         'ORDER BY `date` DESC ');
00055                         }
00056 
00057                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00058                 }
00059 
00064                 public function software_comments()
00065                 {
00066                         $this->software = new Software();
00067                         $this->software->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00068                         $this->software->has_many('software_comments', array('where_clause' => '`approved` = 1'));
00069                         $this->comments = $this->software->software_comments;
00070                 }
00071 
00076                 public function diario()
00077                 {
00078                         $post_factory = new DiarioPost();
00079                         $this->posts = $post_factory->find_by_query('SELECT * ' .
00080                                 'FROM `diario_posts` ' .
00081                                 'WHERE `status` = \'pubblicato\' ' .
00082                                 'ORDER BY `created_at` DESC ' .
00083                                 'LIMIT 10');
00084                 }
00085 
00090                 public function diario_comments()
00091                 {
00092                         $this->article = new DiarioPost();
00093                         $this->article->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00094                         $this->article->has_many('diario_comments', array('where_clause' => '`approved` = 1'));
00095                         $this->comments = $this->article->diario_comments;
00096                 }
00097 
00102                 public function feeds_list()
00103                 {
00104                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00105                 }

00111                 public function feed_permalink()
00112                 {
00113                         return sprintf('http://%s%s',
00114                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00115                                 $this->url_to_myself());
